item.description:
Brunch with a French twist (or Cambodian if you prefer)

Our reservation is for Noon.

Please keep your RSVP updated. If you say that you're coming, but find that you won't be able to make it after all, please change your RSVP.


When I posted this event on the website, I also sent an email to everyone in the group with more details about the restaurant. If you'd like me to send it to you again, use the link next to "Who's hosting?"

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch
